fields.name: offset
fields.description: The field for the offset record component.

fields.name: addSurfaceDepth
fields.description: The field for the addSurfaceDepth record component.

fields.name: secondaryDepthRange
fields.description: The field for the secondaryDepthRange record component.

fields.name: surfaceType
fields.description: The field for the surfaceType record component.

constructors.name: StoneDepthCheck
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a StoneDepthCheck record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) ; primitive components are compared with '=='.

methods.name: offset
methods.description: Returns the value of the offset record component.

methods.name: addSurfaceDepth
methods.description: Returns the value of the addSurfaceDepth record component.

methods.name: secondaryDepthRange
methods.description: Returns the value of the secondaryDepthRange record component.

methods.name: surfaceType
methods.description: Returns the value of the surfaceType record component.
